TEXT.TITLE: GEOFFRION LECLERC FORECASTS RESULTS
TEXT.BODY: (Geoffrion Leclerc Inc), in reporting sharply higher earnings for the six months ended February 28, said it expects third quarter results to continue at a strong pace and approximate the preceding quarters. The brokerage firm earlier reported six month profit rose to 3.5 mln dlrs from 1.9 mln dlrs last year. It did not detail second quarter profit. Reuter
